timeline.bodyText: We don't usually prefix setters with 'with' or 'set'.
timeline.author: millems
millems

timeline.bodyText: We don't usually prefix getters with 'get'. I also think this is out of order and should go below the static methods.
timeline.author: millems
zoewangg
zoewangg

timeline.bodyText:
nit, the naming pattern for most of our unit tests is something like: given_when_then,
so maybe builder_passRequestToken_shouldWork?
timeline.author: zoewangg

replies.bodyText: I was trying to figure out a name in this pattern but I failed so I just used the current simple one lol. Will change it.
replies.author: Quanzzzz
